title: About
text:
My name is Gabriela Palomo, I am a carnivore ecologist, and this is my digital notebook. The idea behind this blog is to have a place that I can use as a digital notebook with notes on how to code my most used models and new ones I learn as I go. I like the idea of having a centralized website with an organized repository to all my scripts instead of having them scattered across multiple laptops and external hard drives. However, I think that others may find my code and explanations (i.e., blog posts) useful and I hope this blog can help others learn as well. I plan to cover from the most basic models to the more complex ones I learn.
You can follow me on , where I am very active -for the most part.

title: My Digital Notebook
text:
Welcome to my website! My name is Gabriela Palomo and I am a carnivore ecologist. I use this website to keep my blog called My Digital Notebook, content from my workshops, and information on how to contact me.
You can follow me on:  or on

title: Blog
text: Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished document. To learn more about Quarto see https://quarto.org.

title: Blog
text:
Running Code
When you click the Render button a document will be generated that includes both content and the output of embedded code. You can embed code like this:

1 + 1

[1] 2


You can add options to executable code like this


[1] 4


The echo: false option disables the printing of code (only output is displayed).
